name: Run It Back (5CentBanana)
description:
This is a game created for the FBLA Computer Game and Simulation Programming challenge 2021... This was made by Nicholas Dienstbier and Adarsh Ashok. It is a puzzle game, where you have to control 2 characters and plan ahead for your actions. Hope you enjoy!

Game is meant to be played in native 1920x1080, so try messing around with the zoom until it fits properly. Had some trouble getting it to work on all monitors, so please be patient.
